inclusion.criterion: candidate for therapy with Sofosbuvir and Daclatasvir with or without Ribavirin
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: direct antiviral drugs were added to his treatment 6 months ago

exclusion.criterion: Chronic hepatitis due causes other than chronic HCV infection
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of alcoholic liver disease, bleeding from esophageal varices, hemochromatosis, autoimmune hepatitis or metabolic liver disease

exclusion.criterion: Coinfection with HIV or HBV infection
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN, RBV, and direct antiviral drugs. His medical record shows previous positive HCV RNA tests.
